extendedIngredients.name: mushrooms
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 jars (4-1/2 ounces each) sliced mushrooms, undrained

extendedIngredients.name: pork roast
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pork crown roast (about 7 pounds and 12 ribs)

recipes.title: Corn-Stuffed Crown Roast
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Place roast on a rack in a large shallow roasting pan. Sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Cover rib ends with foil. Bake, uncovered, at 350째 for 1-1/2 hours.                                                                                           In a Dutch oven, saute celery and onion in butter until tender. Stir in the stuffing, corn, mushrooms, salt, poultry seasoning and remaining pepper. Carefully spoon 1-3 cups into center of roast. Place remaining stuffing in a greased 2-qt. baking dish. Refrigerate until ready to use.                                                                                           Bake roast 1 hour longer or until a thermometer reads 165째 for stuffing. Cover and bake extra stuffing for 30-40 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a serving platter. Let stand for 15 minutes. Remove foil. Cut between ribs to serve.                                        Yield: 12 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Corn-Stuffed Crown Roast in  Quick CookingDecember 2000, p56                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving equals 545 calories, 30 g fat (15 g saturated fat), 124 mg cholesterol, 826 mg sodium, 30 g carbohydrate, 3 g fiber, 38 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Place roast on a rack in a large shallow roasting pan. Sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Cover rib ends with foil.
In a Dutch oven, saute celery and onion in butter until tender. Stir in the stuffing, corn, mushrooms, salt, poultry seasoning and remaining pepper. Carefully spoon 1-3 cups into center of roast.
Place remaining stuffing in a greased 2-qt. baking dish. Refrigerate until ready to use.
Bake roast 1 hour longer or until a thermometer reads 165째 for stuffing. Cover and bake extra stuffing for 30-40 minutes or until browned.
